style.title: GitHub style
style.description: This style is vaguely reminiscent of the GitHub style. There are some cool innovations here.

group.title: Breadcrumbs
group.description: Display settings and appearance of breadcrumbs

property.title: Avatar border radius
property.description: Controls the size of the rounded corners on avatars - a sufficiently large value will make avatars circular

property.title: BB code blocks
property.description: All BB code blocks within messages make use of these styling rules

property.title: Block border framework
property.description: Virtually all blocks have their borders styled with these settings

property.title: Block border radius
property.description: Controls the size of the curve on block border corners

property.title: Block filter bar
property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

property.title: Block footer
property.description: When information needs to be conveyed in a footer element for a block, its style is controlled here

property.title: Block header
property.description: Blocks often have title bars at their tops, which are styled here

property.title: Block link - selected
property.description: Styling for block-type links when in their selected state

property.title: Block padding horizontal
property.description: The horizontal space between the edges of a block and its content

property.title: Block padding vertical
property.description: The vertical space between a block's content and its edges

property.title: Block tab header
property.description: Occasionally, blocks will have multi-part, tab headers, styled with these settings

property.title: Block tab header - selected tab
property.description: The selected tab in multi-part headers takes additional styling from here

property.title: Border color
property.description: Structural borders around blocks of content generally use this color

property.title: Breadcrumbs
property.description: Breadcrumbs list style

property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Button - call to action
property.description: Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread

property.title: Button - default
property.description: Most buttons use this styling, except for primary form submit buttons

property.title: Button - primary
property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

property.title: Accented content background color
property.description: This background color is used for further differentiation from regular content

property.title: Alternate content background color
property.description: In order to differentiate it, some content will be presented on this alternative background

property.title: Highlighted content background color
property.description: When the standard background color is highlighted or selected, it will use this color

property.title: Editor background
property.description: The background for the editor before it is activated

property.title: Flash message bar
property.description: A message may temporarily appear at the top of the screen to indicate the result of an action taken. Its styling can be controlled here.

property.title: Form submit row
property.description: At the bottom of most forms is a bar containing the submit button etc.

property.title: Global action indicator color
property.description: This is the base color of the gadgets that display when an action is being processed in the background.

property.title: Inline moderation bar
property.description: A bar containing controls appears when content is selected for inline moderation. Its appearance is controlled here

property.title: Inline moderation highlight color
property.description: When content is selected for inline moderation, its background color will be replaced with this

property.title: Form input
property.description: Controls the style of most text-input boxes

property.title: Form input - focused
property.description: These rules are applied to text boxes when they are selected for input

property.title: Link color
property.description: Basic hyperlinks on standard background colors will use this style

property.title: Link hover color
property.description: Basic hyperlinks will turn this color when hovered

property.title: Member profile header
property.description: The member profile page's content header is styled with these settings

property.title: Member profile header - name
property.description: The styling of the name of the member whose page is being viewed is controlled here

property.title: Member tooltip header
property.description: The member tooltip, which appears when hovering over user names, is styled with these controls

property.title: Member tooltip header - name
property.description: Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed

property.title: Menu feature border color
property.description: Popup menus have a thick feature border on their upper edge, the styling of which is controlled here

property.title: Menu footer
property.description: When a popup menu has a bottom, footer element, it will use these settings

property.title: Menu header
property.description: Most menus identify themselves with a header just underneath their top border

property.title: Menu link row - selected
property.description: Styling for link rows in menus, when selected or hovered

property.title: Menu tab header
property.description: Multi-part, tabbed menu headers use these settings

property.title: Read node icon color
property.description: When the content within a node has been read, its icon will revert to a less attention-grabbing color, defined here

property.title: Unread node icon color
property.description: Node icons give an at-a-glance indication of whether or not the content housed within the node has been read. The unread icon color should stand out from its background for quick identification

property.title: Description display style
property.description: To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip

property.title: Overlay header
property.description: Overlays use a header element to identify their contents, styled here

property.title: Page background color
property.description: The background of the page itself, on which all other content rests

property.title: Progress bar color
property.description: The progress bar appears at the top of the window when the system is waiting for a response from the server

property.title: Favicon URL (32x32)
property.description: Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site

property.title: Footer
property.description: The footer is the primary element that sits below the main content on all public pages

property.title: Header adjustment color
property.description: The color of the header background is adjusted to be used as the background for the inbox and alerts area in the header

property.title: Logo URL
property.description: The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image.

property.title: Navigation row
property.description: The navigation row sits below the header and contains the primary site navigation tabs and menus

property.title: Navigation padding vertical
property.description: This value defines the amount of padding applied to the main navigational tabs in the header

property.title: Navigation row - selected tab
property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when they are selected

property.title: Navigation row - hovered tab
property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

property.title: Navigation row - menu open
property.description: Styling applied when the popup menu for the current tab is visible

property.title: Staff tools bar
property.description: Visible only to staff, the staff tools bar sits above the header and contains items such as reported content, the moderation queue...

property.title: Sub-navigation row
property.description: Below the main navigation row, this row shows content associated with the selected main navigation tab

property.title: Sub-navigation row - hovered element
property.description: Additional styling applied to sub-navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

property.title: Sub-navigation row - menu-open element
property.description: Styles sub-navigation elements whose popup menu is currently open

property.title: Standalone tabs
property.description: Tabs that are not part of block headers are styled here

property.title: Style type
property.description: This defines the general type of style in use based on whether the content is placed on a light or dark background. This may change how colors are selected in certain scenarios.

property.title: Z-index multiplier
property.description: Controls the relative 'height' of elements in the Z-dimension (perpendicular to the screen). Unless you have a specific reason to change this, leave it alone...
